channel.title: Can't download anything
channel.description:
So I recently got a new HDD, and reinstalled Windows 7 on it again. So I went to download Steam, but for some reason it just stays at "Waiting for cdn.steampowered.com".I tried other downloads, but the same result with the "Waiting for [download server]".After waiting, I just end up not being able to connect to it. I'm also not able to watch video's anywhere. However, I'm able to download & watch stuff from my laptop.
Anyone knows what could cause this?

item.title: Can't download anything
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
So apperently my ISP somehow managed to fuckup my internet only.
Sorry.
/thread
